questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vivian Vance

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: M*a*s*h and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, seinfeld, staff. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On Seinfeld, what was the name of the business Elaine was a partner in, with her former publishing company boss?

options.text: Top of the Muffin to You

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Top of the Muffin to You

questions.question: Which morale boosting event, featured in the series M*A*S*H, was not held during the command of Colonel Potter?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Races of rolling hospital beds

questions.question: When Hawkeye from the series M*A*S*H has a severe case of insomnia, he comes to believe that the war will end if he gives what to the North Koreans?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Latrine

questions.question: In the Pilot episode of M*A*S*H, Hawkeye and Trapper set up a raffle to win two days in Tokyo with a beautiful nurse. Who was the nurse, and who won the raffle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nurse Dish, Mulcahy won

questions.question: At the end of the third season of M*A*S*H actor McLean Stevenson decided to leave the show. What happened to his character Henry Blake?

options.text: His homebound plane was shot down
Killed by a North Korean sniper

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His homebound plane was shot down

questions.question: Though disguised, this psychotic CIA Spy from the TV show M*A*S*H was easily recognizable in each of his visits to the 4077th.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Colonel Flagg

questions.question: What is Jerry Seinfelds favorite super hero?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Superman

questions.question: Which of these characters was played by George Morgan in the first episode of M*A*S*H?

options.text: Hot Lips (usually played by Loretta Swit)
Father Mulcahy (usually played by William Christopher)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Father Mulcahy (usually played by William Christopher)

questions.question: In an early episode of the show M*A*S*H, Harry Morgan, who later played Colonel Potter, guest starred in a different role. What was the name of his character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: General Steele

questions.question: Which of these characters was not made up by the 4077th staff on the TV show M*A*S*H?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Colonel Bloodworth

questions.question: Which trick has not been played on Frank Burns in the TV series M*A*S*H?

options.text: Toilet plunger in place of gun
Removed latrine walls while he was using it

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Snake in the bed

questions.question: What is Frank Burns middle name on the show M*A*S*H?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marion

questions.question: On the TV show M*A*S*H, in order to make Charles feel better, Radar asks Charles parents to send him what childhood artifact?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Toboggan cap

questions.question: Which of these actors did not appear as a guest star on the TV show M*A*S*H?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donald Sutherland

questions.question: After Hawkeye and Trapper destroy an overly war-promoting film in the TV series M*A*S*H, they decide to re-shoot Yankee Doodle Doctor. What comedians do they imitate in their version?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Groucho and Harpo
